uniqueId.description: Unique ID for the data file

system.description: System the data file is for

mustPrecede.description: List of data files that must be loaded before this one

mustFollow.description: List of data files that must be loaded after this one

internalVersion.description: Internal version of the data file (this needs to be incremented when the data file is changed). This must be an integer.

displayVersion.description: Version of the data file that could be displayed to the user.

validGameInternalVersion.description: Internal version of the game that this data file is valid for. This is used to ensure that the data file is not loaded for an incompatible game version.

oneOf.description: Version 0 of the game, this encompasses all of 0.x since it's the first version and there's no consideration for backwards compatibility or API stability.
oneOf.title: Versions 0.x of the game
